sentences.english: The ritual displays the custom of ancestor worship of the Yi people.
sentences.chinese: 从杀年猪的仪式可以窥视到彝族原始崇拜的一角。

sentences.english: The birth of Torch Festival stems from of the ancient Yi people's worshiping of fire.
sentences.chinese: 火把节的诞生始于彝族先民对火的崇拜。

sentences.english: The first chapter directly describes the natural and sociocultural fostering space of Yi flower-drum dance.
sentences.chinese: 第一章直接介入彝族花鼓舞的自然人文生境。

sentences.english: "Haicai Tune" of the Yi Nationality got its name from a sea-vegetable in Yilong Lake.
sentences.chinese: 石屏彝族“海菜腔”是从异龙湖中的海菜而得名的。

sentences.english: It is not even considered imperative that all people of Yi Ethnic Minority learn it.
sentences.chinese: 人们并不认为所有彝族人绝对要学习彝语。

sentences.english: Reflects the Torch Festival of Yi people in Yunnan defying brutal force for the struggle against the spirit of a happy life.
sentences.chinese: 反映了云南与对幸福生活的斗争精神暴力彝族火把节。

sentences.english: The Liangshan Yi are an ethnic group at risk;
The Gourd Myth shows the worship for the reproductive capacity of the maternal body amon…
sentences.chinese: 彝族谷种神话无一例外地体现了对母体的崇拜。

sentences.english: The Yi world in the field of vision of emic and etic research.
sentences.chinese: 主客位研究视野中的彝族世界。

sentences.english: Juding by her dress, she may be of the Yi nationality.
sentences.chinese: 从她的打扮看，她或许是彝族。

sentences.english: He is a well-known intellectual among the Yi people.
sentences.chinese: 他是彝族人中有名的智者。

sentences.english: The Pemo is central character in the ceremony offering sacrifices to Yi people ancestor.
sentences.chinese: “毕摩”是彝族宗教信仰活动的中心人物。

sentences.english: four lost their interest in Yi traditional culture.
sentences.chinese: 四个人已经失去了对彝族文海的兴趣。

sentences.english: Yi ethnic wedding is taking place over there.
sentences.chinese: 那边好像有彝族人在结婚。

sentences.english: The Gourd Myth shows the worship for the reproductive capacity of the maternal body among the …
sentences.chinese: 彝族谷种神话无一例外地体现了对母体的崇拜。

sentences.english: Developing the Yi nationality medicine, in theory we need further excavation and unscrambling.
sentences.chinese: 发展彝族医药，应在理论上进一步加以挖掘整理。
